    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        @NonNull
public static ListenerHandler getInstance(java.lang.String identifier)
        Get Instance of current network operation

        Ex: To Get RecentPosts

             PostRequests req = (PostRequests) NetworkHandler.getInstance(PostRequests.IDENTIFIER);
     req.getRecentPosts(new ResponseHandler<GetPost[]>() {
          @Override
         public void onResponse(Response<GetPost[]> response, WordpressException ex) {
             if (response != null) {
                 // handle response
             } else {
                 Log.d(TAG, ex.getMessage());
             }
         });
     });
        Parameters:
        identifier - must be one of NetworkHandler.Requests
        Returns:
        Instance of ListenerHandler if available else throws WordpressException

      • getKey

        @NonNull
private static java.lang.String getKey(java.lang.String identifier)
        Generate unique Key.
        Parameters:
        identifier - One @NetworkHandler.Requests
        Returns:
        unique key
